meta.name: Little Chaotic Friends
meta.about:
Little Chaotic Friends is a group of spirited illustrators, designers, and craftsmen from HK.
Our mission is to espouse artistry, encourage original works, ameliorate the underpaid design industry, and stand up for the causes of justice and freedom.

meta.name: Little Chaotic Friends
meta.about: Encourage original works, ameliorate the underpaid design industry, and stand up for the causes of justice and freedom.
